ThingDef.label: muscle stimulator
ThingDef.description: Through special chemicals and electric shocks this little chip is able to stimulate the muscles so they can operate at above maximum performance.

ThingDef.label: tactical cornea implant
ThingDef.description: An enhanced implant which provides the user with additional information about potential targets and suggests a perfect firing angle.

ThingDef.label: auxiliary AI (constructing)
ThingDef.description: Archotechs do not waste time on training and education, not even for complex jobs. AIs installed in the brain permanently communicate with the user and act as a guide. How they do it is beyond our understanding. Requires brain surgery research before installing.
